sentence: I packed a backpack full of books for school.
clue: A backpack is used to carry stuff.

sentence: The apple fell from the tree and hit the ground.
clue: An apple is sweet.

sentence: We saw a museum during our vacation in Chicago.
clue: A museum is where people see old and important things.

sentence: She bought a new phone after losing her old one.
clue: A phone is used to talk to people.

sentence: A teacher helped me solve the math problem.
clue: A teacher helps students learn.

sentence: I left my keys on the kitchen counter.
clue: Keys can open doors.

sentence: The car wouldn't start in the cold weather.
clue: People use cars to go places.

sentence: A dog barked loudly outside the window.
clue: A dog barks and runs around.

sentence: He plays the guitar in a local band.
clue: A guitar is used to make music.

sentence: She cleaned the dusty mirror in the hallway.
clue: You can see yourself in a mirror.

sentence: We waited for the bus in the rain.
clue: A bus can take many people somewhere.

sentence: They painted the wall bright yellow.
clue: A wall is the end of a room.

sentence: He found a coin on the sidewalk.
clue: A coin is used to buy things.

sentence: A river runs through the valley.
clue: A river is a long flowing body of water.

sentence: The store closes at 9 p.m. every night.
clue: A store is where people shop for things.

sentence: I heard a bell ring loudly across the schoolyard.
clue: A bell makes a ringing sound.

sentence: A large crowd gathered to watch the parade.
clue: A crowd is many people in one place.

sentence: The cake looked delicious on the table.
clue: Cakes are a common birthday food.

sentence: We visited the library to borrow some books.
clue: A library is where people borrow books.

sentence: She dropped her wallet in the parking lot.
clue: A wallet is used to hold money.

sentence: A bridge connects the two sides of the city.
clue: People can cross bridges.

sentence: I lost my hat in the wind.
clue: A hat is worn on someone's head.

sentence: He wore a suit to the wedding.
clue: A suit is special clothes.

sentence: They bought a new lamp for the living room.
clue: A lamp is used to make a room bright.

sentence: The child drew a picture of a unicorn.
clue: A child is a young person.

sentence: A chair was missing from the dining room.
clue: People sit on chairs.

sentence: The ball rolled under the couch.
clue: A ball is used to play games.

sentence: She put a bottle of water in her bag.
clue: A bottle holds liquids.

sentence: We stayed at a fancy hotel by the beach.
clue: A hotel is where people stay when traveling.

sentence: The computer crashed while I was working.
clue: You are using a computer right now.

sentence: He gave me a gift for my birthday.
clue: A gift is something that is given.

sentence: The cloud looked like a dragon.
clue: There are usually clouds in the sky.

sentence: I hung a picture on the wall.
clue: A picture is something you can look at that shows what a person, place, or thing looks like.

sentence: The plant needs more sunlight.
clue: Plants are usually green.

sentence: A loud alarm woke everyone up.
clue: A alarm is used to wake people up.

sentence: We watched a funny movie last night.
clue: You can watch movies in a theater.

sentence: The kitchen smells like cookies.
clue: A kitchen is where food is prepared.

sentence: A pencil rolled off the desk.
clue: A pencil is used to write or draw.

sentence: I saw a huge ship in the harbor.
clue: A ship is used to travel on water.

sentence: The sun set behind the mountains.
clue: The sun is the bright ball in the sky.

sentence: My shoes got soaked in the rain.
clue: Shoes are worn on people's feet.

sentence: She wore a dress to the party.
clue: A dress is fancy clothing.

sentence: We took the train to the city.
clue: A train travels on rails.

sentence: The clock struck twelve.
clue: A clock tells the time.

sentence: He held a ticket in his hand.
clue: A ticket is used to access something.

sentence: A fire burned in the fireplace.
clue: A fire keeps the room warm.

sentence: They visited a small village in the countryside.
clue: A village is a small town.

sentence: The sky turned orange at sunset.
clue: The sky is above us.

sentence: A path led through the forest.
clue: A path is like a road but for walking.

sentence: The beach was crowded on Saturday.
clue: A beach is where the ocean meets land.

sentence: He sat beside the window and read a book.
clue: We can look outside through a window.

sentence: The door creaked when it opened.
clue: A door is where we enter a room.

sentence: I put the groceries on the table.
clue: A table is a piece of furniture with a flat top.

sentence: She held a baby in her arms.
clue: A baby sleeps and cries.

sentence: They played a game after dinner.
clue: A game is used for fun.

sentence: The carpet was soft underfoot.
clue: A carpet covers the floor.

sentence: We waited in the line for tickets.
clue: People wait in lines.

sentence: A bird landed on the branch.
clue: A bird flies and lands on trees.

sentence: I drew a map of the island.
clue: A map helps people find their way.

sentence: The light flickered suddenly.
clue: A light is used to make a room bright.

sentence: A note was left on the fridge.
clue: A note is a short message.

sentence: The ceiling had a small crack.
clue: A ceiling is the top of the room.

sentence: He opened the box slowly.
clue: A box is a container.

sentence: A bench stood beneath the tree.
clue: A bench is a wide chair.

sentence: She bought a new coat for winter.
clue: A coat keeps people warm.

sentence: They painted the fence white.
clue: A fence is a barrier.

sentence: A leaf floated to the ground.
clue: A leaf grows on a tree.

sentence: The floor was covered in toys.
clue: A floor is the bottom of a room.

sentence: I drank from a clean glass.
clue: A glass is a cup.

sentence: We stopped at a gas station.
clue: Gas is fuel for cars..

sentence: The noise came from the attic.
clue: A noise is a sound.

sentence: He used a sharp knife to cut vegetables.
clue: A knife is used to cut things.

sentence: The forest was full of wildlife.
clue: A forest is an area with trees.

sentence: She found a ring in the drawer.
clue: A ring goes on a finger.

sentence: I saw smoke from the chimney.
clue: A chimney lets the smoke outside.
